metadata.synopsis: This character will stay at Figaro's when He is alive, both before and after Dolor.

0.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
0.text: I'm afraid in the case of Master Figaro's death, the entire shop was to be entrusted to my... esteemed colleague.
0.context: NodeContext: miffed that she's not the one running the shop

5.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
5.text: So if you've any fashion needs, go bother him.
5.context: NodeContext: miffed that she's not the one running the shop

1.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
1.text: I think Master Figaro has a few spaces between appointments today. You're in luck!
1.context: NodeContext: miffed that she's not the one running the shop

2.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
2.text: Can't believe someone would try and murder Master Figaro.
2.context: NodeContext: miffed that she's not the one running the shop

4.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
4.text: He wouldn't hurt a fly. Well - unless it was buzzing around one of his fitting rooms.

3.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
3.text: You're really better speaking to Master Figaro. He'll be able to find you an outfit that's just right.
3.context: NodeContext: miffed that she's not the one running the shop

6.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
6.text: I'm glad Figaro's all right, though. Without him I'd have no job or dress sense.
6.context: NodeContext: miffed that she's not the one running the shop

7.speaker: Bobula Hanvers
7.text: My colleague's in charge - go bother him with any fashion queries. I've got stock to sort.
7.context: NodeContext: miffed that she's not the one running the shop
